Boolean Supporting.FileIO.CloseFile ( FileStream  s )

Closes the FileStream passed into the function.

Parameters:
sThe FileStream to be closed.
Returns:
Returns a boolean value indicating success or failure.
FileStream Supporting.FileIO.Openfile ( String  fileName,
Char  permissions 
)

Opens or creates a file based on the filename and permissions passed in to the function.

Parameters:
fileNameThe name of the file to be opened.
permissionsThe permissions to be given to the opened file.
Returns:
If successful FileStream pointing to the opened file. If unsuccessful, returns null.

String  data 
)

Writes the database information to a file.

Parameters:
sThe filestream to write the data to.
dataThe data to be written to the file.

A boolean value indicating success or failure.
